url_filters_help_text.message: Matched against current tab URL (top-level site). Multiple filters are OR'ed (any match), not AND; excludes override includes.

button_add_exclude.description: Label for add exclude filter button

url_filters_match_glob.description: Match type label for advanced glob matching
